configMenu.Hint: Packages can register a debug mode setting which will appear below. Checking it or setting a log level will enable more detailed output in the console.

config-menu.Name: Debug Flag Config
config-menu.Label: Debug Flags
config-menu.Hint: Every core debug flag and modules you have activated might register flags for their own debugging which you can toggle here.

override-config-debug.Name: Override CONFIG.debug?
override-config-debug.Hint: Whether or not to use the dev-mode override settings for CONFIG.debug flags. Setting to false will cause a reload.

suppress-too-small.Name: Suppress Window Size Warning
suppress-too-small.Hint: Suppresses the window size warning on startup.

hooks.Name: Hooks
hooks.Hint: Turning this on will console log all hooks as they fire while you interact with the Foundry UI.
